name: Cashmere Connecticut Toro
additionalNotes:
Made with a golden-brown Ecuador Connecticut wrapper that envelops a core of finely aged Nicaraguan long fillers and binder, and crafted with Esteban Carrerasâ€™ top-notch construction, these cigars are a delight! What makes this offering truly unique is the strength; while Connecticut-style cigars are typically mellower and tame, Cashmere is full-bodied and flavorful yet maintains the smoothness in the smoke found on its mellower cousins.
